profile.name: ISO 19005-2:2011 - 6.1.2 File header - PDF header
profile.description: The file header shall begin at byte zero and shall consist of “%PDF-1.n” followed by a single EOL marker, where 'n' is a single digit number between 0 (30h) and 7 (37h)
profile.creator: veraPDF Consortium

rule.description: The file header shall begin at byte zero and shall consist of "%PDF-1.n" followed by a single EOL marker, where 'n' is a single digit number between 0 (30h) and 7 (37h)

error.message: File header does not start at byte offset 0 or does not comply with the requirements of PDF/A-2 specification
